title: mpsTemplates: Templates for Me — mpsTemplates-package
text: mpsTemplates package provides opinionated ggplot themes

title: an opinionated ggplot2 theme — theme_mps_noto
text: base_size default text size px base_family defaults "NotoSansDisplay_Condensed". provided package. Generally, use sensible sans serif font available system. base_line_size default line size base_rect_size default rect size

title: an opinionated ggplot2 theme — theme_mps_noto
text: Uses Google's Noto Sans Display font default. Using ragg::agg_png() related graphics device ensure font properly detected used.

title: an opinionated ggplot2 theme — theme_mps_noto
code: library(ggplot2) library(ragg)  file <- tempfile(fileext = '.png') agg_png(file) ggplot(cars) +   geom_point(aes(speed, dist)) +   theme_mps_noto() +   labs(title = "Cars", subtitle = "Speed and stopping distance",        caption = "Ezekiel, M (1930) Methods of Correlation Analysis",        x = "Speed [mph]",        y = "Stopping Distance [ft]") dev.off() #> agg_png  #>       2
